div.p: >> Jon: HEY, EVERYBODY, THAT IS OUR SHOW, BEFORE WE GO,
REAL QUICK, THE HEAD WRITER OF OUR PROGRAM, THE GREAT TIM CARVEL,-- FOR MAD
MAGAZINE FOR TEN YEARS, NOW A BOOK CALLED-- IN THE BOOK STORES NOW, YOU SHOULD GET
IT, UNLESS YOU ARE A LOSER.
HERE IT IS, YOUR MOMENT OF ZEN.
>> WILL MARGINALIZE HIMSELF WITH THE REST OF THE COUNTRY.
HE IS TO THE GOING TO APPEASE THE GAY COMMUNITY WHICH IS ONE OF THE FOUR MAJOR FUNDERS OF THE
DEMOCRATIC PARTY A LONG WITH JEWS,
